cs.ualberta.conditionlog
Class DatabaseAdapter

java.lang.Object
  cs.ualberta.conditionlog.DatabaseAdapter

public class DatabaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as an interface for manipulating the database. After creating a DatabaseAdapter object, call open() on it before using it or you will get Null Pointer Exceptions. Once you are done with the DatabaseAdapter, call close() on it. To add a condition to the database use addCondition(String condition) To add a photo to the database use addPhoto(String filepath, String condition) To get a list of all conditions use loadConditions() To get a list of all tags use loadTags() To get a list of all photos of a condition use loadPhotosByCondition(String condition) To get a list of all photos with a tag use loadPhotosByTag(String tag) To add a tag to a photo use addTag(String filepath, String tag) To delete a condition, use deleteCondition(String condition)

Author:
tgriffit

Constructor Detail

DatabaseAdapter

public DatabaseAdapter(Context context)
Constructor for the adapter. It sets up a DatabaseHelper to maintain the database connection.

Parameters:
context - - the current application context
Method Detail

open

public void open()
Opens a connection to the database using the DatabaseHelper. Must be called before any other DatabaseAdapter methods can be called.

close

public void close()
Closes the connection to the database. Should always be called when you are doing calling DatabaseAdapter methods.

loadPhotosByCondition

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadPhotosByCondition(java.lang.String cond)
Adds all filepaths corresponding to photos of a given condition to an ArrayList, sorted by the date the photo was created

Parameters:
cond - - the condition to search for
Returns:
An ArrayList containing the filepaths to all photos matching the condition

loadPhotosByTag

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> loadPhotosByTag(java.lang.String tag)
Adds all filepaths corresponding to photos with a given tag to an ArrayList, sorted by the date the photo was created

Parameters:
tag - - the photo tag to search for
Returns:
An ArrayList containing the filepaths to all photos marked with the tag

loadConditions

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> loadConditions()
Returns a list containing all conditions added to the database so far and a photo from each to use as a thumbnail

Returns:
An ArrayList of ArrayLists, each of which contains a condition and a photo filepath

loadTags

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> loadTags()
Loads every tag that has been added to the database so far and a thumbnail for each one. Assumes that a tag must be associated with a photo, and thus the photo entry cannot be null

Returns:
An ArrayList of ArrayLists, each of which contains a tag and a photo filepath

addPhoto

public void addPhoto(java.lang.String photo,
                     java.lang.String cond)
Adds a photo to the photos table and to the conditions table with its associated condition

Parameters:
photo - - a filepath to a .bmp file
cond -

addCondition

public void addCondition(java.lang.String cond)
Adds a new condition to the conditions table with no associated photo. The next photo added to the condition will be added to this line in the table.

Parameters:
cond - - the condition to create

addTag

public void addTag(java.lang.String photo,
                   java.lang.String tag)
Adds a line to the tags table which marks a photo with a certain tag

Parameters:
photo - - a filepath to a .bmp file
tag - - the tag to add

deleteCondition

public void deleteCondition(java.lang.String cond)
Removes all lines associated condition from the conditions table. The photos still exist, and can still be associated with tags, but will not be found by searching for condition.

Parameters:
cond - - the condition to remove.
